stench.name: Stench
stench.description: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

speedBoost.name: Speed Boost
speedBoost.description: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

battleArmor.name: Battle Armor
battleArmor.description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.

limber.name: Limber
limber.description: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

colorChange.name: Color Change
colorChange.description: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

flashFire.name: Flash Fire
flashFire.description: Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

shieldDust.name: Shield Dust
shieldDust.description: This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

ownTempo.name: Own Tempo
ownTempo.description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

suctionCups.name: Suction Cups
suctionCups.description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

shadowTag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowTag.description: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.

roughSkin.name: Rough Skin
roughSkin.description: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

wonderGuard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderGuard.description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
